DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate whether bilevel positive airway pressure rapidly improve ventilation continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) patient acute pulmonary edema . CPAP deliver via simple device connect oxygen .

DOC.criteria: age > 16 yr , acute onset severe respiratory distress , bilateral rale typical finding congestion chest radiograph breathing frequency > 30/min , SpO2 > 90 % , use accessory respiratory muscle
